Package it.polimi.ingsw.Model

Class Builder

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.Model.Builder
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
Apollo, Artemis, Athena, Atlas, Demeter, Hephaestus, Minotaur, Pan, Prometheus
public abstract class Builder
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
Every class extending this AND annotated with @God is a god implementation.
See Also:

    • Builder

      public Builder​(Cell position, Player player)

  • Method Details

    • getGameTable

      private GameTable getGameTable()

    • isFirst

      public boolean isFirst()
      Returns:
      true if the builder is the "first" as in first in the Player.getBuilderList()-returned list

    • getPosition

      public Cell getPosition()
      Returns:
      Cell on which the builder currently is

    • setPosition

      public void setPosition​(Cell position) throws InvalidMoveException, WinnerException
      Sets position of builder to a given cell. Before executing, checks for preconditions.
      Parameters:
      position - position to move the builder to
      Throws:
      InvalidMoveException - if the move isn't allowed / it's straight up wrong
      WinnerException - if the move led to a win

    • isWinner

      protected boolean isWinner()
      Very simply checks whether, after the last valid move, the builder moved to a TOP level.
      Returns:
      true if the client moved to a top level (hence it's the winner)

    • isValidBuild

      protected ClientState isValidBuild​(Cell cell, BuildingType newheight) throws InvalidBuildException
      This method checks for the validity of a build move.
      Parameters:
      cell - represents the cell on which the builder wants to build
      newheight - represents "new height", meaning the height which the builder wants to build on
      Returns:
      next state
      Throws:
      InvalidBuildException - when the build is illegal

    • executeMove

      protected ClientState executeMove​(Cell position)
      This function executes the move. The default implementation can be changed by the gods.
      Parameters:
      position - position to which the builder is to be moved
      Returns:
      next state of the player

    • verifyBuild

      protected void verifyBuild​(Cell cell, BuildingType newheight) throws InvalidBuildException
      This method checks postconditions for building
      Parameters:
      cell - represents the cell on which the builder wants to build
      newheight - represents "new height", meaning the height which the builder wants to build on
      Throws:
      InvalidBuildException - when the build is illegal

    • resetState

      protected void resetState()
      Resets player's state to WAIT.

    • clearPrevious

      protected void clearPrevious()
      This method is useful for those gods who have a "previous" attribute, like Demeter. It has to be extended by the god so that it clears said attribute.

    • isValidMove

      protected void isValidMove​(Cell finalPoint) throws InvalidMoveException
      This method checks the basic rules for moving, which are valid for every builder type
      Parameters:
      finalPoint - represents the cell to which the builder wants to move
      Throws:
      InvalidMoveException - when the move is illegal

    • verifyMove

      protected void verifyMove​(Cell finalPoint) throws InvalidMoveException
      This method checks the postconditions for moving
      Parameters:
      finalPoint - position to check
      Throws:
      InvalidMoveException - in case postconditions are not met

    • forceMove

      void forceMove​(Cell position)
      Parameters:
      position - specifies position where to force-move the builder

    • getPlayersAsStream

      private java.util.stream.Stream<Player> getPlayersAsStream()

    • checkMoveHandicaps

      private void checkMoveHandicaps​(Cell finalPoint) throws InvalidMoveException
      Checks all the handicaps for the move
      Parameters:
      finalPoint - final point of the move
      Throws:
      InvalidMoveException - if an moveHandicap makes the move invalid

    • checkBuildHandicaps

      private void checkBuildHandicaps​(Cell cell, BuildingType height) throws InvalidBuildException
      Checks all the handicaps for the build
      Parameters:
      cell - final point of the build
      height - height of the building
      Throws:
      InvalidBuildException - if an buildHandicap makes the move invalid

    • buildHandicap

      protected boolean buildHandicap​(Cell cell, BuildingType height)
      This method gets overridden by those gods that need to implement a buildHandicap to others.
      Parameters:
      cell - final point of the build
      height - height of the building
      Returns:
      true if the buildHandicap matches ( --> the build can't be done ), false otherwise

    • moveHandicap

      protected boolean moveHandicap​(Cell finalPoint, Cell startingPoint)
      This method gets overridden by those gods that need to implement a moveHandicap to others.
      Parameters:
      finalPoint - final point of the move
      startingPoint - starting point of the move
      Returns:
      true if the moveHandicap matches ( --> the move can't be done ), false otherwise

    • swapPosition

      protected void swapPosition​(Builder firstBuilder, Builder otherBuilder)
      Swaps two builders' positions.
      Parameters:
      firstBuilder - builder which wants to swap position
      otherBuilder - builder whose position gets swapped

    • getPlayer

      protected Player getPlayer()
      Returns:
      the builder's associated player

    • hasAvailableMoves

      boolean hasAvailableMoves()
      Checks whether the builder has any feasible move.
      Returns:
      true if there's at least a valid move to be made.

    • hasAvailableBuilds

      boolean hasAvailableBuilds()
      Checks whether the builder has any feasible build.
      Returns:
      true if there's at least a valid build to be made.

    • getFirstState

      public ClientState getFirstState()
      Returns:
      State from which the player starts.
